criteria: Ability to identify and list individuals who promote health within the school environment.
Ability to identify and list individuals in the community who promote health.
Demonstrates understanding of the specific actions and roles that constitute 'promoting health'.
descriptions: Does not identify any individuals in the school who promote health.
Identifies one individual in the school who promotes health, but the choice may be vague or not clearly health-related.
Identifies 2 individuals in the school, but descriptions of their roles in promoting health are minimal.
Identifies 3 individuals in the school and provides a basic description of how they promote health.
Identifies 4 individuals in the school and clearly explains their roles in promoting health with specific examples.
Identifies 5 or more individuals in the school, thoroughly explains their roles in promoting health, and provides insightful examples of their impact.
Does not identify any individuals in the community who promote health.
Identifies one individual in the community who promotes health, but the choice may be vague or not clearly health-related.
Identifies 2 individuals in the community, but descriptions of their roles in promoting health are minimal.
Identifies 3 individuals in the community and provides a basic description of how they promote health.
Identifies 4 individuals in the community and clearly explains their roles in promoting health with specific examples.
Identifies 5 or more individuals in the community, thoroughly explains their roles in promoting health, and provides insightful examples of their impact.
Shows no understanding of what actions or roles constitute promoting health.
Demonstrates a limited understanding, with vague or incorrect examples of how individuals promote health.
Demonstrates some understanding, but the explanations of how individuals promote health are superficial.
Demonstrates a clear understanding, providing accurate descriptions of how individuals promote health.
Demonstrates a strong understanding, providing detailed and relevant explanations of how individuals promote health with supporting reasons.
Demonstrates an exceptional understanding, providing insightful and nuanced explanations of how individuals promote health, including analysis of the effectiveness of their actions.
